The Spider That Feared Heights: A New Kind of Web-Slinging Adventure - In this game, players take on the role of a spider named Sammy who has a fear of heights. As Sammy, they must navigate through a series of increasingly higher platforms, all while avoiding obstacles and enemies. The twist? Sammy can only move around by swinging from webs, which they must carefully craft and maintain in order to avoid falling. Players must strategically place webs to create a safe path for Sammy to navigate, all while dealing with the added challenge of their own fear of heights.

The Spider That Couldn't Spin Webs - In this game, players take on the role of a spider named Max who has lost the ability to spin webs. Max must navigate through a series of levels, each one filled with obstacles and enemies, without being able to rely on their web-spinning abilities. Instead, Max must use their quick thinking and agility to dodge attacks and find creative solutions to overcome challenges. As players progress through the levels, they will unlock new abilities and tools that will help Max on their journey to regain their web-spinning powers.

Spider-Man: The Flyng Spider - In this game, players take on the role of a spider who has gained the ability to fly. Players must navigate through a series of levels, using their newfound flying abilities to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies. As players progress through the levels, they will unlock new abilities and upgrades that will help them on their journey to become the ultimate flying spider.

The Spider's Revenge - In this game, players take on the role of a spider named Lily who has been wronged by a group of ants. Lily must navigate through a series of levels, using her web-spinning abilities to lure the ants into traps and defeat them. As players progress through the levels, they will unlock new abilities and upgrades that will help Lily on her quest for revenge.
